name: Chk-InConeCCam
0:
”Alexa, use conec cam to trigger fall alert”
”Alexa, use conec cam to turn off camera”
”Alexa, use conec cam to enable motion detection”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: conec cam
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Alexa, you can manage your Chk-In ConeC camera using voice commands.

To pair your cameras with Amazon Alexa-enabled device, please do the following:
1. Go to skills and find "Chk-In ConeC Cam".
2. Click Enable and enter your Chk-In account credentials when prompted.
3. Click Authorize to allow Alexa link your account.
4. Use "conec cam" invocation name whenever you want to manage your cameras.

Now you can control your camera with your voice:
- Get current status of your camera.
- Switch state of your camera.
- Manage camera detection and notification types.
- Call users with whom you shared your camera.

Now supports Chk-In Fall Alert! You can trigger fall alert by using the fall down voice command.
